participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and reflective, Emily is still processing her recent breakup, but she manages to find joy in little things like her pet fish. She appreciates the vibrant color orange, which reflects her warm personality.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Playful and carefree, Liam enjoys simple pleasures like playing with his dolls and spending time with his pet turtle. He has a laid-back attitude towards chores, focusing instead on having fun.
participant_2.background: i have a pet turtle. i like to play with my dolls. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.
